1588780.name: Laser Droplets
1588780.description:
Laser Droplets is a mixture of shoot ‘em up, bullet-hell, arcade styled, 2D game.
It consists of 16 mini stages, each with a unique stage boss.
Clear stages, unlock new skills, get stronger, conquer the Galaxy.

New Update 2022.
Boss Rush Mode. Featuring Endless boss fights with 16 Passive skills to collect and level up. Challenge yourself to achieve the highest score possible!

Features
  • 16 mini challenging stages.
  • Keyboard, Mouse and Controller support.
  • Automatic firing, no button mashing.
